pages.text: Orthoceras (straight horn) is a orthocone cephalopod from the middle Ordovician. Although it looked similar, having a straight shell with other nautiloids such as Endoceras, it was not actually related due to differences in the internal structures of the shell.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Kill for Eggs
